name: Egg Game (itch)
description:
CONTROLS:

Left and Right Arrow Keys to move
Up to Jump
Z to Egg Bounce
Shift to Egg Crawl

Hope you like it!

Music Credits (in order of appearance):

Sober Lullaby - mathgrant

A Jubilant Sport - mathgrant

Victorious Accomplishment - mathgrant

These credits are also in the in-game credits as well, but better safe than sorry!
